articles.title: How Trump's tariffs will boost my small business
articles.description: If cheap goods from China become less cheap compared to those made ethically, products from American companies like mine become more viable.
articles.content:
In 2003, I witnessed the end of an era as a junior employee of Levi’s when the company closed its last factories in America.
We had held out as long as we could. The market had shifted rapidly since NAFTA went into effect in January 1994, and even mo... [4130 chars]
